title: InternalNode
description: InternalNode is the Schema for the internalnodes API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: InternalNodeSpec defines the desired state of InternalNode.

interface.description: Interface contains the information about network interfaces.

gateway.description:
Gateway contains the information about the gateway interface.
The gateway interface is created on every gateway to connect them to the node related with the internalnode.

name.description: Name is the name of the interface added to the gateways.

node.description: Node contains the information about the node interface.

ip.description: IP is the IP of the interface added to the node.

status.description: InternalNodeStatus defines the observed state of InternalNode.

nodeIP.description: NodeAddress is the address of the node.

local.description: Local is the src IP used to contact a pod on the same node.

remote.description: Remote is the src IP used to contact a pod on another node.
